name: jina_reader
description: Read and extract content from web pages using Jina AI's powerful web reader

url.description: URL of the webpage to read and extract content from

format.description:
Output format for the extracted content:
        • Default (RECOMMENDED): The default pipeline optimized for most websites and LLM input
        • Markdown: Returns the markdown directly from the HTML, bypassing the readability filtering
        • HTML: Returns documentElement.outerHTML
        • Text: Returns document.body.innerText
        • Screenshot: Returns the image URL of the first screen
        • Pageshot: Enhanced screenshot with additional metadata

withLinks.description: Include links in the extracted content

withImages.description: Include images in the extracted content

name: jina_search
description: Search the web for information using Jina AI's semantic search engine

query.description: Search query to find information on the web

count.description: Number of search results to return

returnFormat.description: Format of the returned search results

name: jina_fact_check
description: Verify the factuality of statements using Jina AI's fact-checking capability

deepdive.description: Enable deep analysis with more comprehensive research
